## Density of weight, w.r.t number of cylinders

**Date: April 4, 2018**

```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(plotly))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(ggplot2))

g <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, fill = factor(cyl), 
                   col = factor(cyl))) + 
    geom_density(alpha = 0.8) + scale_fill_discrete(name = "#cylinder") +
    scale_color_discrete(name = "col", guide = F) + 
    labs(title = "Density of weight, w.r.t number of cylinders", x = "Weight", y = "Density") + 
    theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 15,
                                    color = "tomato", 
                                    face = "bold"))
gp <- purrr::quietly(ggplotly)
res <- gp(g)
res$result
```
